name: Mega Man: Unlimited
description: Mega Man Unlimited also known as (ロックマンアンリミテッド Rokkuman' anrimiteddo?) is an unofficial fan-made game created by MegaPhilX. It was released on July 14, 2013. According to the game's creator, it was originally meant to be a "hypothetical" sequel to Mega Man 9, created before the official Mega Man 10.
